text:
Nice and relaxing bar. The place is comfortable and affordable.
Promotion is going on Monkey shoulder only 88$

Nice place, affordable drinks.
New food menu coming up!! Awesome, keep up the happy hour drinks rates...
Taal staffs are very smart looking n professionals with their work.the atmosphere in Taal in is very clean n fresh

Is this a Bangladesh club? The board outside states clearly it is Bollywood club .
However, as soon as you enter you hear Music that is not Bollywood. Instead, playing Bangla music and songs in Bangla language,
I mean one Bangla one Bollywood Hindi song ok but all Bangla songs? Why? Doesnt make sense? Not even one new song! Not even one Punjabi song. Not even one Tamil song, not one telugu song? Why biased towards Bangla songs?
I would never recommend this place if you know and are a fan of Hindi music ie Bollywood - dont be fooled by the name on the board outside!
